data.lyric:
[ti:I Could Use a Love Song]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:Hero]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Could Use a Love Song - Maren Morris
[00:06.39]Written by：Maren Morris/Jimmy Robbins/Laura Veltz
[00:12.78]Usually a drink will do the trick
[00:14.95]
[00:15.46]Take the edge off quick sitting in the dark
[00:18.01]With a shared cigarette
[00:19.88]
[00:20.70]Seeing eye to eye and heart to heart
[00:23.30]But maybe I'm just getting old
[00:26.28]Used to work but now it don't
[00:28.73]A long gone drive
[00:30.74]
[00:31.35]You know the kind where you take a turn and you don't know why
[00:35.77]
[00:36.32]But it clears your mind a surefire cure
[00:39.31]I need something stronger
[00:41.35]
[00:43.85]That'll last a little longer
[00:47.08]
[00:48.43]I could use a love song
[00:51.76]
[00:52.27]That takes me back just like that
[00:54.77]When it comes on
[00:57.19]To a time when I wouldn't roll my eyes
[00:59.86]At a guy and a girl
[01:02.35]Who make it work in a world
[01:04.94]That for me so far just seems to go so wrong
[01:09.23]
[01:10.20]Yeah I could use I could use a love song
[01:15.37]
[01:22.99]I wish I didn't know so much
[01:25.35]
[01:26.12]I peeked behind the curtain
[01:28.21]Now that magic rush
[01:30.65]
[01:31.19]Feels like a trick that isn't working
[01:33.79]But I haven't lost all hope yet
[01:36.36]
[01:38.77]Yeah it's hurting but it ain't dead
[01:41.76]
[01:43.23]I could use a love song
[01:47.03]That takes me back just like that
[01:49.40]When it comes on
[01:52.03]To a time when I wouldn't roll my eyes
[01:54.59]At a guy and a girl
[01:57.19]Who make it work in a world
[01:59.58]That for me so far just seems to go so wrong
[02:04.04]
[02:05.06]Yeah I could use I could use a love song
[02:10.49]
[02:18.73]Give me a sign or a rhyme or a reason
[02:23.10]
[02:24.68]Just something that I can believe in
[02:28.97]
[02:30.27]I could use a love song
[02:34.02]That takes me back just like that
[02:36.42]When it comes on
[02:38.49]
[02:39.00]To a time when I wouldn't roll my eyes
[02:41.57]At a guy and a girl
[02:43.26]
[02:43.90]Who make it work in a world
[02:46.65]That for me so far just seems to go so wrong
[02:51.32]
[02:52.02]Yeah I could use
[02:53.77]
[02:54.71]Yeah I could use I could use a love song
data.trans:
[ti:我可以用一首情歌]
[ar:Maren Morris]
[al:Hero]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.39]//
[00:12.78]通常喝上一杯
[00:14.95]
[00:15.46]坐在无尽的黑暗里 抽着烟
[00:18.01]似乎这样就能舒缓心情
[00:19.88]
[00:20.70]四目相对 推心置腹
[00:23.30]但或许我只是不再年轻
[00:26.28]这些过去一向很有帮助 现在却毫无作用
[00:28.73]开车久了
[00:30.74]
[00:31.35]你就知道在哪里需要转弯 无需什么理由
[00:35.77]
[00:36.32]而你心知肚明 这种感觉绝不会有错
[00:39.31]我需要一些更有效的东西
[00:41.35]
[00:43.85]来使这种感觉更持久些
[00:47.08]
[00:48.43]我可以用一首情歌
[00:51.76]
[00:52.27]带我追忆往昔的美好
[00:54.77]一切像是发生在昨天
[00:57.19]我甚至无需移开目光
[00:59.86]一个男孩和一个女孩
[01:02.35]就可以拥有整个世界
[01:04.94]可这些对我而言 陌生又遥远 更像是个错误
[01:09.23]
[01:10.20]是的 我可以唱首情歌
[01:15.37]
[01:22.99]多么希望我还是天真无邪的模样
[01:25.35]
[01:26.12]躲在窗帘后面偷看
[01:28.21]而魔法忽然来袭
[01:30.65]
[01:31.19]却像个恶作剧 不起丝毫作用
[01:33.79]但迄今为止 我并未绝望
[01:36.36]
[01:38.77]我的内心虽然支离破碎 但并不是一具行尸走肉
[01:41.76]
[01:43.23]我可以用一首情歌
[01:47.03]带我追忆往昔的美好
[01:49.40]一切像是发生在昨天
[01:52.03]我甚至无需移开目光
[01:54.59]一个男孩和一个女孩
[01:57.19]就可以拥有整个世界
[01:59.58]可这对我而言 陌生又遥远 更像是个错误
[02:04.04]
[02:05.06]是的 我可以唱一首情歌
[02:10.49]
[02:18.73]请给我一点暗示 一点旋律 或是一个理由
[02:23.10]
[02:24.68]一些我能相信的东西就好
[02:28.97]
[02:30.27]我可以用一首情歌
[02:34.02]带我追忆往昔的美好
[02:36.42]一切像是发生在昨天
[02:38.49]
[02:39.00]我甚至无需移开目光
[02:41.57]一个男孩和一个女孩
[02:43.26]
[02:43.90]就可以拥有整个世界
[02:46.65]可这对我而言 陌生又遥远 更像是个错误
[02:51.32]
[02:52.02]是的 我可以
[02:53.77]
[02:54.71]是的 我可以唱首情歌
